name: GLOW (itch) (Jake3101)
description:
GLOW

Navigate your way through the void collecting lights as you go. Use the gravitational pull from the vortexes in order to increase efficiency. Spinning vortexes will carry you within their spin while sucking you in, stationary vortexes can be passed through in order to gain a speed boost but don't hang around too long else you wont be able to escape!

Joystick controller is the suggested input type.

Music: Delectatio - Ominous

Created for Weekly Game Jam - Week 153. Theme: Roll.

This game will remain in developed after the game jam to make a fully fleshed out version.
